short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply a fancy CSS blur effect to the LeetCode coding pad

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LeetCode Blur is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your problem-solving experience on LeetCode by blurring previously written code solutions. This prevents accidental spoilers, helping you to approach problems with a fresh perspective every time you visit. Ideal for those who want to practice problems multiple times or for educational settings where spoilers can hinder learning.
